verses.verse: And this is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

In the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> shall they kill <S%H7819><s%> the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>; and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> of it all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof <S%H451><s%>: the fat tail, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them <S%H3689><s%>, which is by the loins, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> upon the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, shall he take away <S%H5493><s%>;
and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it is a trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>.

Every male <S%H2145><s%> among the priests <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H398><s%>: it shall be eaten in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

As is the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, so is the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>; there is one <S%H259><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> for them <S%H3548><s%>: the priest that maketh atonement therewith <S%H3722><s%>, he shall have it.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> any man <S%H376><s%>'s burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, even the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have to himself the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> which he hath offered <S%H7126><s%>.

And every meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> that is baken <S%H644><s%> in the oven <S%H8574><s%>, and all that is dressed <S%H6213><s%> in the frying-pan <S%H4802><s%>, and on the baking-pan <S%H4227><s%>, shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s that offereth it <S%H7126><s%>.

And every meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, or dry <S%H2720><s%>, shall all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> have <S%H376><s%>, one as well as another <S%H251><s%>.
And this is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, which one shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

If he offer <S%H7126><s%> it for a thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> soaked <S%H7246><s%>.

With cakes <S%H2471><s%> of leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%> for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>.

And of it he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of each oblation <S%H7133><s%> for a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; it shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s that sprinkleth <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of his oblation <S%H7133><s%>; he shall not leave <S%H3240><s%> any of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

But if the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%>, it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> that he offereth <S%H7126><s%> his sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; and on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%>:
but that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And if any of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> on <S%H398><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, it shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%>, neither shall it be imputed <S%H2803><s%> unto him that offereth <S%H7126><s%> it <S%H6292><s%>: it shall be an abomination, and the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> of it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>; it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>. And as for the flesh <S%H1320><s%>, every one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat thereof <S%H398><s%>:

but the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, that pertain unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon him <S%H5315><s%>, that soul shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And when any one <S%H5315><s%> shall touch <S%H5060><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing <S%H2932><s%>, the uncleanness of man <S%H120><s%>, or an unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast <S%H929><s%>, or any unclean <S%H2931><s%> abomination <S%H8263><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%>, which pertain unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> no fat <S%H2459><s%>, of ox <S%H7794><s%>, or sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or goat <S%H5795><s%>.

And the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which is torn of beasts <S%H2966><s%>, may be used <S%H6213><s%> for any other service <S%H4399><s%>; but ye shall in no wise <S%H398><s%> eat of it <S%H398><s%>.

For whosoever eateth <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%>, of which men offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, even the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> it shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> no manner of blood <S%H1818><s%>, whether it be of bird <S%H5775><s%> or of beast <S%H929><s%>, in any of your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.
Whosoever <S%H5315><s%> it be that eateth <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, He that offereth <S%H7126><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> out of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%>:

his own hands <S%H3027><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>; the fat <S%H2459><s%> with the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall he bring <S%H935><s%>, that the breast <S%H2373><s%> may be waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>; but the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>'.

And the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> for a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace-offerings <S%H8641><s%>.

He among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%>, shall have the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%> for a portion <S%H4490><s%>.

For the <S%H2373><s%> wave-breast <S%H8573><s%> and the heave8641, 7785 - thigh have I taken <S%H3947><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and unto his sons <S%H1121><s%> as their portion <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

This is the anointing-portion <S%H4888><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and the anointing-portion <S%H4888><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, out of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he presented <S%H7126><s%> them to minister unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office;

which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be given <S%H5414><s%> them of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he anointed <S%H4886><s%> them <S%H2708><s%>. It is their portion for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.

This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, and of the sin-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and of the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>, and of the consecration <S%H4394><s%>, and of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H817><s%>;

which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> their oblations <S%H7133><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
